name: Couscous-Stuffed Eggplant
keywords: couscous, eggplant, plum tomato, low calorie, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 large jalapeno pepper, stemmed, seeded and minced
1 tablespoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prick the eggplants a few times with a fork. Put them on a baking sheet, and bake until soft, about 45 minutes. When cool enough to handle, cut the eggplants in half lengthwise. Scoop the flesh into a bowl carefully to avoid tearing the skins. Set the shells aside.

Put the remaining ingredients in the bowl with the eggplant and stir to combine. Taste, and adjust seasoning if needed. Spoon the mixture into the eggplant shells, mounding it over the top. Either serve the stuffed eggplants whole or cut them in half crosswise. Place on a platter and serve.
